Bernie Sanders said in his letter that the nation's political climate had been damaged by a`` right-wing media echo chamber'' that is transmitting a reactionary world view to the tens of millions of millions of Americans who watch or listen to them every day. In a separate statement, state Republican Chairman Steve Larrabee said:`` By using this tragedy to demonize those he disagrees with, the Barack Obama is doing exactly what he pretends to deplore.''
